attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently, the United Kingdom is over-run with large groups of heretics, blasphemers, schismatics and other insults to the Catholic Church, especially Rowan Williams. We beleive that this country can only regain its glorious empire if we return to the one true faith of Rome, Catholiscism.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
